Licenses

Where used in the Licenses section and appended subsections, the phrase 'this program' refers to ParamBSpline2.

This program is copyrighted. It may be freely distributed provided this copyright is retained with the program. It is provided free of charge and with no warranty of any kind.

I do request that where this software is used in research which leads to a technical publication please acknowledge my efforts and send me a copy or reference. I also live by "publish or perish". I leave the level of acknowledgement to your discretion and good professional character. I am especially open to doing more work on the code for those willing to cooperate with this.
